meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of astronauts or space travel.
meanings.sent1: The astronautic mission to Mars was a great success.
meanings.sent2: She studied astronautic engineering to become a space scientist.
meanings.sent3: The astronautic team had a zero-gravity party in the space station.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were as vast and limitless as the astronautic universe.
meanings.sent5: The astronautic suits shimmered in the sunlight, ready for the spacewalk.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the science or practice of space travel.
meanings.sent1: The astronautic research center developed new propulsion systems.
meanings.sent2: Astronautic technology has advanced greatly over the years.
meanings.sent3: The astronautic experiment accidentally launched a toy rocket into orbit.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an astronautic playground of ideas and innovations.
meanings.sent5: The astronautic calculations were precise, ensuring a safe journey to the moon.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the profession or activities of astronauts.
meanings.sent1: The astronautic training program was rigorous but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: She admired the astronautic achievements of the first woman in space.
meanings.sent3: The astronautic team celebrated their successful return to Earth with a parade.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to astronautic exploration knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The astronautic community welcomed new members with open arms.
